UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the amino acid sequence of the UniProt entry.

Literature.Title: New Antibacterial Peptides from the Freshwater Mollusk Pomacea poeyana (Pilsbry, 1927).
Literature.Author: González García M, Rodriguez A, Alba A, Vázquez AA, Morales Vicente FE, Pérez-Erviti J, Spellerberg B, Stenger S, Grieshober M, Conzelmann C, Münch J, Raber H, Kubiczek D, Rosenau F, Wiese S, Standker L, Otero-González AJ

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>30µg/ml),Listeria monocytogenes ATCC BAA-679(MIC=>30µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(no activity data),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(no activity data),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(no activity data),Mycobacterium tuberculosis(no activity data)
